summary.span: 使用可延伸樣式表語言轉換 (XSLT) 樣式表，轉換 XML 資料。

span.span: Transforms XML data using an Extensible Stylesheet Language for Transformations (XSLT) style sheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別是 Microsoft.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時。The class is obsolete in the Microsoft .NET Framework version 2.0. 類別是新的 XSLT 處理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 XslCompiledTransform 類別](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)並[從 XslTransform 類別移轉](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支援 XSLT 1.0 語法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 樣式表必須使用命名空間`http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must use the namespace `http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 其他引數也可以加入至樣式表使用類別。Additional arguments can also be added to the style sheet using the class. 這個類別包含樣式表和擴充物件可從樣式表呼叫的輸入的參數。This class contains input parameters for the style sheet and extension objects which can be called from the style sheet. 若要將 XML 資料的轉換：To transform XML data: 1. 建立物件。Create an object. 2. 使用方法來載入樣式表轉換。Use the method to load the style sheet for the transformation. 此方法有數個多載，可以載入樣式表 using ， ， ，或使用檔案的位置 URL。This method has several overloads and can load a style sheet using an , , , or a URL with the location of the file. 3. 使用來轉換 XML 資料的方法。Use the method to transform the XML data. 這個方法有數個多載，以及可處理不同類型的輸入和輸出。This method has several overloads and can handle different types of input and output. 您也可以指定包含要在轉換期間使用做為輸入的其他引數。You can also specify an containing additional arguments to use as input during the transformation. **安全性考量****Security Considerations** 建立使用 類別的應用程式時，您應留意下列項目及其含意：When creating an application that uses the class, you should be aware of the following items and their implications: - 依預設會啟用擴充物件。Extension objects are enabled by default. 如果將包含擴充物件的 物件傳遞到 方法，則會加以利用。If an object containing extension objects is passed to the method, they are utilized. - XSLT 樣式表可以包含其他檔案及內嵌指令碼區塊的參考。XSLT style sheets can include references to other files and embedded script blocks. 惡意使用者可以利用這一點，藉由提供給您的資料或樣式表執行時將會導致您的系統處理，直到電腦資源不足。A malicious user can exploit this by supplying you with data or style sheets that when executed will cause your system to process until the computer runs low on resources. - 在混合的信任環境中執行的 XSLT 應用程式，會產生用於詐騙的樣式表。XSLT applications that run in a mixed trust environment can result in style sheet spoofing. 例如，居心不良的使用者可載入含有害樣式表的物件，然後將其傳遞給另一使用者，該使用者隨後會呼叫 方法並執行轉換。For example, a malicious user can load an object with a harmful style sheet and hand it off to another user who subsequently calls the method and executes the transformation. 您可以降低這些安全性問題不接受物件、 XSLT 樣式表或從不受信任來源的 XML 來源資料。These security issues can be mitigated by not accepting objects, XSLT style sheets, or XML source data from untrusted sources. **指令碼支援****Scripting Support** 此類別支援使用內嵌指令碼`msxsl:script`項目。This class supports embedded scripting using the `msxsl:script` element. 在.NET Framework 版本 1.1，樣式表的辨識項會決定哪些權限都各有內嵌的指令碼。In version 1.1 of the .NET Framework, the evidence of the style sheet determines what permissions are given to embedded scripts. - 如果樣式表載入從統一資源識別元 (URI)，則 URI 用來建立辨識項。If the style sheet was loaded from a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI), the URI is used to create the evidence. 這個辨識項包括加上其站台和區域的 URI。This evidence includes the URI along with its site and zone. - 如果使用其他來源載入樣式表，您還可以提供辨識項，藉由傳遞物件至方法。If the style sheet was loaded using another source, you can provide evidence by passing a object to the method. 否則，指令碼組件具有完全信任。Otherwise, the script assembly has full trust. 非完全信任呼叫端：`UnmanagedCode`權限，才能編譯內嵌的指令碼。Semi-trusted callers: `UnmanagedCode` permission is required to compile the embedded script. `ControlEvidence` 權限，才能提供至方法。`ControlEvidence` permission is required to provide to the method. A如果呼叫端沒有必要的權限，就會擲回。A is thrown if the caller does not have the necessary permissions. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 和 。See and for more information. `msxsl:script`項目具有下列需求：The `msxsl:script` element has the following requirements: - `msxsl:script`項目屬於`urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt`命名空間。The `msxsl:script` element belongs to the `urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt` namespace. 樣式表必須包含命名空間宣告`xmlns:msxsl=urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt`。The style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:msxsl=urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt`. - `msxsl:script`元素可以包含`language`屬性，指定要使用的指令碼語言。The `msxsl:script` element can include a `language` attribute that specifies the scripting language to use. 值`language`屬性必須是下列其中之一： C#、 CSharp、 VB、 VisualBasic、 JScript 或 JavaScript。The value of the `language` attribute must be one of the following: C#, CSharp, VB, VisualBasic, JScript, or JavaScript. 語言名稱不區分大小寫，因為 JavaScript 和 javascript 都有效。Because the language name is not case-sensitive, JavaScript and javascript are both valid. 如果`language`屬性未指定，則會預設為 JScript。If a `language` attribute is not specified, it defaults to JScript. - `msxsl:script`元素必須包含`implements-prefix`包含表示指令碼區塊相關聯的命名空間的前置詞的屬性。The `msxsl:script` element must include an `implements-prefix` attribute that contains the prefix representing the namespace associated with the script block. 此命名空間必須定義樣式表中。This namespace must be defined within the style sheet. 樣式表可以包含多個指令碼區塊會依命名空間。A style sheet can include multiple script blocks which are grouped by namespace. 您不能有相同的命名空間內的多個語言的指令碼區塊。You cannot have script blocks with multiple languages within the same namespace. 指令碼區塊可以呼叫另一個的指令碼區塊中定義的函式，提供指令碼區塊會位於相同的命名空間。Script blocks can call a function defined in another script block, provided the script blocks reside within the same namespace. 根據規則和指令碼語言的語法會剖析指令碼區塊的內容 (藉由提供`language`屬性)。The contents of a script block are parsed according to the rules and syntax of the scripting language (supplied by the `language` attribute). 例如，如果您有 C# 指令碼區塊，註解會加上`//`字元。For example, if you had a C# script block, comments would be prefixed by the `//` characters. 註解必須是有效的 XML 內容。The comments must be valid XML content. `Note` 建議您將指令碼區塊包裝在 CDATA 區段。`Note` It is recommended that you wrap script blocks in a CDATA section. ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 類別是新的 XSLT 處理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 XslCompiledTransform 類別](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)並[從 XslTransform 類別移轉](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支援 XSLT 1.0 語法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 樣式表必須包含命名空間宣告`xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"`. 這個方法會載入 XSLT 樣式表，包括在中參考的任何樣式表`xsl:include`和`xsl:import`項目。This method loads the XSLT style sheet, including any style sheets referenced in `xsl:include` and `xsl:import` elements. 使用解析外部資源與不具使用者認證。External resources are resolved using an with no user credentials. 如果樣式表位於此動作需要驗證的網路資源，請使用採用的多載為其中一個引數，並指定具有必要認證。If the style sheet(s) are located on a network resource which requires authentication, use the overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an with the necessary credentials. 如果樣式表包含內嵌指令碼，指令碼會編譯成組件中。If the style sheet contains embedded scripting, the script is compiled to an assembly. 樣式表的 URI 用來建立辨識項，會套用至組件。The URI of the style sheet is used to create evidence, which is applied to the assembly. 與相關的問題方法和樣式表，內嵌指令碼，請參閱知識庫文件 Q316755 Microsoft 在http://support.microsoft.com。For issues with the method and style sheets with embedded scripts, see article Q316755 in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. > [!NOTE] > 如果呼叫端沒有`UnmanagedCode`權限，內嵌指令碼就不會編譯和就會擲回。If the caller does not have `UnmanagedCode` permission, the embedded script is not compiled and a is thrown. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 和 。See and for more information. ## Examples 下列範例會將 XML 文件轉換成 HTML 文件。The following example transforms an XML document into an HTML document. 它會在資料表中顯示 ISBN、 標題和每本書籍的價格。It displays the ISBN, title, and price for each book in a table. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 範例會使用下列兩個輸入檔案。The sample uses the following two input files. `books.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/XML/books.xml#2)] `output.xsl` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/XML/output.xsl#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 類別是新的 XSLT 處理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 XslCompiledTransform 類別](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)並[從 XslTransform 類別移轉](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支援 XSLT 1.0 語法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 樣式表必須包含命名空間宣告`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 這個方法會載入 XSLT 樣式表，包括在中參考的任何樣式表`xsl:include`和`xsl:import`項目。This method loads the XSLT style sheet, including any style sheets referenced in `xsl:include` and `xsl:import` elements. 使用解析外部資源與不具使用者認證。External resources are resolved using an with no user credentials. 如果樣式表位於此動作需要驗證的網路資源，請使用採用的多載為其中一個引數，並指定具有必要認證。If the style sheet(s) are located on a network resource which requires authentication, use the overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an with the necessary credentials. 從目前節點載入樣式表透過其所有子系。The style sheet loads from the current node of the through all its children. 這可讓您使用做為樣式表的文件的一部分。This enables you to use a portion of a document as the style sheet. 之後方法傳回時，位於樣式表的結尾之後的下一個節點。After the method returns, the is positioned on the next node after the end of the style sheet. 如果到達文件結尾，則 會定位於檔案結尾 (EOF)。If the end of the document is reached, the is positioned at the end of file (EOF). 如果樣式表包含實體，您應該指定，可解析實體 (傳回`true`)。If the style sheet contains entities, you should specify an that can resolve entities ( returns `true`). 在此情況下，可用。In this case, an can be used. 如果樣式表包含內嵌指令碼，指令碼會編譯成組件中。If the style sheet contains embedded scripting, the script is compiled to an assembly. 組件具有完全信任。The assembly has full trust. 建議的做法是提供辨識項使用方法。The recommended practice is to provide evidence using the method. 與相關的問題方法和樣式表，內嵌指令碼，請參閱知識庫文件 Q316755 Microsoft 在http://support.microsoft.com。For issues with the method and style sheets with embedded scripts, see article Q316755 in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. > [!NOTE] > 如果呼叫端沒有`UnmanagedCode`權限，內嵌指令碼就不會編譯和就會擲回。If the caller does not have `UnmanagedCode` permission, the embedded script is not compiled and a is thrown. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 和 。See and for more information. ## Examples 下列範例會將轉換依標題排序所有書籍的 XML 檔案。The following example transforms an XML file sorting all the books by title. [!code-cpp[XslTransform.Load3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load3/CPP/trans3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XslTransform.Load3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load3/CS/trans3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XslTransform.Load3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load3/VB/trans3.vb#1)] 此範例會使用下列的資料檔案，做為輸入。The example uses the following data files as input. `books.xml` [!code-xml[XslTransform.Load3#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load3/XML/books.xml#2)] `titles.xsl` [!code-xml[XslTransform.Load3#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load3/XML/titles.xsl#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 類別是新的 XSLT 處理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 XslCompiledTransform 類別](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)並[從 XslTransform 類別移轉](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支援 XSLT 1.0 語法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 樣式表必須包含命名空間宣告`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 這個方法會載入 XSLT 樣式表，包括在中參考的任何樣式表`xsl:include`和`xsl:import`項目。This method loads the XSLT style sheet, including any style sheets referenced in `xsl:include` and `xsl:import` elements. 使用解析外部資源與不具使用者認證。External resources are resolved using an with no user credentials. 如果樣式表位於此動作需要驗證的網路資源，請使用採用的多載為其中一個引數，並指定具有必要認證。If the style sheet(s) are located on a network resource which requires authentication, use the overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an with the necessary credentials. 從目前的位置載入樣式表。The style sheet is loaded from the current position of the . 若要使用載入的文件的一部分做為樣式表，瀏覽至樣式表開頭所對應的節點。To use just a portion of the loaded document as the style sheet, navigate to the node corresponding to the beginning of the style sheet. 在後方法傳回時，位於樣式表開頭 (上`xsl:style sheet`節點)。After the method returns, the is positioned at the beginning of the style sheet (on the `xsl:style sheet` node). 如果樣式表包含內嵌指令碼，指令碼會編譯成組件中。If the style sheet contains embedded scripting, the script is compiled to an assembly. 組件具有完全信任。The assembly has full trust. 建議的做法是提供辨識項使用方法。The recommended practice is to provide evidence using the method. 與相關的問題方法和樣式表，內嵌指令碼，請參閱知識庫文件 Q316755 Microsoft 在http://support.microsoft.com。For issues with the method and style sheets with embedded scripts, see article Q316755 in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. > [!NOTE] > 如果呼叫端沒有`UnmanagedCode`權限，內嵌指令碼就不會編譯和就會擲回。If the caller does not have `UnmanagedCode` permission, the embedded script is not compiled and a is thrown. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 和 。See and for more information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 類別是新的 XSLT 處理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 XslCompiledTransform 類別](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)並[從 XslTransform 類別移轉](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支援 XSLT 1.0 語法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 樣式表必須包含命名空間宣告`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 如果樣式表包含內嵌指令碼，指令碼會編譯成組件中。If the style sheet contains embedded scripting, the script is compiled to an assembly. 樣式表的 URI 用來建立辨識項，會套用至組件。The URI of the style sheet is used to create evidence, which is applied to the assembly. 與相關的問題方法和樣式表，內嵌指令碼，請參閱知識庫文件 Q316755 Microsoft 在http://support.microsoft.com。For issues with the method and style sheets with embedded scripts, see article Q316755 in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. > [!NOTE] > 如果呼叫端沒有`UnmanagedCode`權限，內嵌指令碼就不會編譯和就會擲回。If the caller does not have `UnmanagedCode` permission, the embedded script is not compiled and a is thrown. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 和 。See and for more information. ## Examples 下列範例會將 XML 文件轉換成 HTML 文件。The following example transforms an XML document into an HTML document. 此範例會載入 XSLT 樣式表包含`xsl:include`參考另一個樣式表的項目。The example loads an XSLT style sheet which contains an `xsl:include` element referencing another style sheet. 傳遞至設定的認證存取網路資源，包含的樣式表所需的方法。An is passed to the method which sets the credentials necessary to access the network resource for the included style sheet. [!code-csharp[XslTransform.Load2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load2/CS/trans2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XslTransform.Load2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load2/VB/trans2.vb#1)] 此範例會使用下列的資料檔案，做為輸入。The example uses the following data files as input. `books.xml` [!code-xml[XslTransform.Load2#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load2/XML/books.xml#2)] `sort.xsl` [!code-xml[XslTransform.Load2#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load2/XML/sort.xsl#3)] `includefile.xsl` [!code-xml[XslTransform.Load2#4](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load2/XML/includefile.xsl#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 類別是新的 XSLT 處理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 XslCompiledTransform 類別](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)並[從 XslTransform 類別移轉](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支援 XSLT 1.0 語法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 樣式表必須包含命名空間宣告`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 這個方法會載入 XSLT 樣式表，包括在中參考的任何樣式表`xsl:include`和`xsl:import`項目。This method loads the XSLT style sheet, including any style sheets referenced in `xsl:include` and `xsl:import` elements. 從目前節點載入樣式表透過其所有子系。The style sheet loads from the current node of the through all its children. 這可讓您使用做為樣式表的文件的一部分。This enables you to use a portion of a document as the style sheet. 之後方法傳回時，位於樣式表的結尾之後的下一個節點。After the method returns, the is positioned on the next node after the end of the style sheet. 如果到達文件結尾，則 會定位於檔案結尾 (EOF)。If the end of the document is reached, the is positioned at the end of file (EOF). 如果樣式表包含實體，您應該指定，可解析實體 (傳回`true`)。If the style sheet contains entities, you should specify an that can resolve entities ( returns `true`). 在此情況下，可用。In this case, an can be used. 如果樣式表包含內嵌指令碼，指令碼會編譯成組件中。If the style sheet contains embedded scripting, the script is compiled to an assembly. 組件具有完全信任。The assembly has full trust. 建議的做法是提供辨識項使用方法。The recommended practice is to provide evidence using the method. 與相關的問題內嵌指令碼的方法和樣式表，請參閱知識庫文件 Q316755 Microsoft 在http://support.microsoft.com。For issues with the method and style sheets with embedded scripts see article Q316755 in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. > [!NOTE] > 如果呼叫端沒有`UnmanagedCode`權限，內嵌指令碼就不會編譯和就會擲回。If the caller does not have `UnmanagedCode` permission, the embedded script is not compiled and a is thrown. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 和 。See and for more information.

## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 類別是新的 XSLT 處理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 XslCompiledTransform 類別](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)並[從 XslTransform 類別移轉](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支援 XSLT 1.0 語法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 樣式表必須包含命名空間宣告`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 這個方法會載入 XSLT 樣式表，包括在中參考的任何樣式表`xsl:include`和`xsl:import`項目。This method loads the XSLT style sheet, including any style sheets referenced in `xsl:include` and `xsl:import` elements. 從目前節點載入樣式表透過其所有子系。The style sheet loads from the current node of the through all its children. 這可讓您使用做為樣式表的文件的一部分。This enables you to use a portion of a document as the style sheet. 之後方法傳回時，位於樣式表的結尾之後的下一個節點。After the method returns, the is positioned on the next node after the end of the style sheet. 如果到達文件結尾，則 會定位於檔案結尾 (EOF)。If the end of the document is reached, the is positioned at the end of file (EOF). 如果樣式表包含實體，您應該指定，可解析實體 (傳回`true`)。If the style sheet contains entities, you should specify an that can resolve entities ( returns `true`). 在此情況下，可用。In this case, an can be used. 與相關的問題方法和樣式表，內嵌指令碼，請參閱知識庫文件 Q316755 Microsoft 在http://support.microsoft.com。For issues with the method and style sheets with embedded scripts, see article Q316755 in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. 有不同的方式，提供辨識項。There are different ways to provide evidence. 下表描述何種辨識項，以便提供一般使用者案例。The following table describes what type of evidence to provide for common user scenarios. |情節Scenario|若要提供的辨識項型別Type of evidence to provide| |--------------|---------------------------------| |XSLT 樣式表是獨立的或來自您信任的程式碼基底。The XSLT style sheet is self-contained or comes from a code base that you trust.|使用您的組件的來源辨識項。Use the evidence from your assembly.

XsltTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); 
xslt.Load(xslReader, resolver, this.GetType().Assembly.Evidence);
| |XSLT 樣式表來自外部來源。The XSLT style sheet comes from an outside source. 已知來源的源頭，而且沒有可驗證的 URL。The origin of the source is known, and there is a verifiable URL.|建立辨識項使用的 URL。Create evidence using the URL.

XsltTransform xslt = new XslTransform();
 Evidence evidence = XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl(stylesheetURL); 
xslt.Load(xslReader,resolver,evidence);
| |XSLT 樣式表來自外部來源。The XSLT style sheet comes from an outside source. 來源的源頭未知。The origin of the source is not known.|將辨識項設為 `null`。Set evidence to `null`. 不會處理指令碼區塊、不支援 XSLT `document()` 函式，且不允許已授權的擴充物件。Script blocks are not processed, the XSLT `document()` function is not supported, and privileged extension objects are disallowed.

此外，您也可以設定`resolver`參數來`null`。Additionally, you can also set the `resolver` parameter to `null`. 這可確保`xsl:import`和`xsl:include`不會處理元素。This ensures that `xsl:import` and `xsl:include` elements are not processed.| |XSLT 樣式表來自外部來源。The XSLT style sheet comes from an outside source. 來源的源頭未知，但是您需要指令碼支援。The origin of the source is not known, but you require script support.|自呼叫端要求識別項。Request evidence from the caller. API 的呼叫端必須提供一個方法，通常提供辨識項，類別。The API of the caller must provide a way to provide evidence, typically the class.| ## Examples 下列範例會執行 XSLT 轉換所在`xsltReader`是包含樣式表並`secureURL`是受信任的 URL，可用來建立。The following example performs an XSLT transformation where `xsltReader` is an containing a style sheet and `secureURL` is a trusted URL that can be used to create . 方法用來建立套用至樣式表。The method is used to create which is applied to the style sheet. [!code-cpp[XslTransform.Load4#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load4/CPP/trans_ev.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XslTransform.Load4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load4/CS/trans_ev.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XslTransform.Load4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load4/VB/trans_ev.vb#1)]

exception.span: 目前的節點不符合有效的樣式表。

span.span: The current node does not conform to a valid style sheet.

exception.span: 參考的樣式表需要功能，而提供的辨識項不允許此功能。

span.span: The referenced style sheet requires functionality that is not allowed by the evidence provided.

exception.span: 呼叫端嘗試提供辨識項，但沒有 使用權限。

span.span: The caller tries to supply evidence and does not have permission.
for providing evidence.

XsltTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); 
xslt.Load(xslNav, resolver, this.GetType().Assembly.Evidence);
| |XSLT 樣式表來自外部來源。The XSLT style sheet comes from an outside source. 已知來源的源頭，而且沒有可驗證的 URL。The origin of the source is known, and there is a verifiable URL.|建立辨識項使用的 URL。Create evidence using the URL.

XsltTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); 
Evidence evidence = XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl(style sheetURL); 
xslt.Load(xslNav,resolver,evidence);
| |XSLT 樣式表來自外部來源。The XSLT style sheet comes from an outside source. 來源的源頭未知。The origin of the source is not known.|將辨識項設為 `null`。Set evidence to `null`. 不會處理指令碼區塊、不支援 XSLT `document()` 函式，且不允許已授權的擴充物件。Script blocks are not processed, the XSLT `document()` function is not supported, and privileged extension objects are disallowed.

此外，您也可以設定`resolver`參數來`null`。Additionally, you can also set the `resolver` parameter to `null`. 這可確保`xsl:import`和`xsl:include`不會處理元素。This ensures that `xsl:import` and `xsl:include` elements are not processed.| |XSLT 樣式表來自外部來源。The XSLT style sheet comes from an outside source. 來源的源頭未知，但是您需要指令碼支援。The origin of the source is not known, but you require script support.|自呼叫端要求識別項。Request evidence from the caller. API 的呼叫端必須提供一個方法，通常提供辨識項，`Evidence`類別。The API of the caller must provide a way to provide evidence, typically the `Evidence` class.| ## Examples 下列範例會使用從外部來源的樣式表的 XSLT 轉換。The following example performs an XSLT transformation using a style sheet from an outside source. 樣式表來自受信任的來源，因為`resolver`並`evidence`參數會設定為`null`。Because the style sheet comes from an untrusted source, the `resolver` and `evidence` parameters are set to `null`. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 類別是新的 XSLT 處理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 XslCompiledTransform 類別](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)並[從 XslTransform 類別移轉](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支援 XSLT 1.0 語法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 樣式表必須包含命名空間宣告`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法是在.NET Framework 1.1 版中已過時。This method is obsolete in version 1.1 of the .NET Framework. 設定屬性會決定如何 XSLT`document()`函式已解決。The setting of the property determines how the XSLT `document()` function is resolved. 建議的做法是使用採用方法物件做為其中一個引數。The recommended practice is to use the method which takes an object as one of its arguments. ## Examples 下列範例會轉換`books.xml`檔案中，使用`output.xsl`樣式表並將結果輸出至`books.html`檔案。The following example transforms the `books.xml` file using the `output.xsl` style sheet and outputs the results to the `books.html` file. [!code-cpp[XslTransform.Transform3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/xsltransform.transform3/CPP/trans_snip2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XslTransform.Transform3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/xsltransform.transform3/CS/trans_snip2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XslTransform.Transform3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/xsltransform.transform3/VB/trans_snip2.vb#1)] 此範例會使用下列兩個輸入的檔案：The sample uses the following two input files: `books.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/XML/books.xml#2)] `output.xsl` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/XML/output.xsl#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 類別是新的 XSLT 處理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 XslCompiledTransform 類別](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)並[從 XslTransform 類別移轉](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支援 XSLT 1.0 語法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 樣式表必須包含命名空間宣告`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. > [!NOTE] > 此方法現在已過時。This method is now obsolete. 設定屬性會決定如何 XSLT`document()`函式已解決。The setting of the property determines how the XSLT `document()` function is resolved. 建議的做法是使用採用方法物件做為其中一個引數。The recommended practice is to use the method which takes an object as one of its arguments. `args`與進行比對`xsl:param`樣式表中定義的項目。The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. `xsl:output`至輸出時，不支援項目(`xsl:output`項目會被忽略)。The `xsl:output` element is not supported when outputting to an (the `xsl:output` element is ignored). 請參閱[XslTransform 的輸出](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for more information. 這個方法可讓您執行非同步轉換的來源文件。This method enables you to do an asynchronous transformation of the source document. 轉換是指套用到整個文件。Transformations apply to the document as a whole. 換言之，如果您要傳入的節點不是文件的根節點，則不會阻止轉換程序取得已載入文件中的所有節點。In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 若要轉換節點片段，您必須建立包含僅節點片段，並將其傳遞到方法。To transform a node fragment, you must create an containing just the node fragment and pass that to the method. 下列範例會執行的轉換節點片段。The following example performs a transformation on a node fragment. ```csharp XslTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); xslt.Load("print_root.xsl"); XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.Load("library.xml"); // Create a new document containing just the node fragment. XmlNode testNode = doc.DocumentElement.FirstChild; XmlDocument tmpDoc = new XmlDocument(); tmpDoc.LoadXml(testNode.OuterXml); // Pass the document containing the node fragment // to the Transform method. Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out); ``` 此範例會使用`library.xml`和`print_root.xsl`檔案做為輸入，並將下列命令以在主控台的輸出。The example uses the `library.xml` and `print_root.xsl` files as input and outputs the following to the console. ``` Passing Pride And Prejudice to print_root.xsl Root node is book. ``` `library.xml` ```xml Pride And Prejudice Hook ``` `print_root.xsl` ```xml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 類別是新的 XSLT 處理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 XslCompiledTransform 類別](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)並[從 XslTransform 類別移轉](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支援 XSLT 1.0 語法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 樣式表必須包含命名空間宣告`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. `args`與進行比對`xsl:param`樣式表中定義的項目。The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 整體套用至文件的轉換選取項目。The transformation selections apply to the document as a whole. 換句話說，如果目前節點設定在文件根節點以外的節點樹狀結構，轉換程序不會防止存取載入的文件中的所有節點。In other words, if the current node is set on a node tree other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 在執行轉換後，會保留在其原始狀態。After the transformation has been performed, the remains in its original state. 這表示節點，也就是目前轉換程序之前，會保留目前的節點之後已呼叫方法。This means that the node, which is current before the transformation process, remains the current node after the method has been called. 因為提供唯讀的輸出，`xsl:output`項目會被忽略。Because provides read-only output, the `xsl:output` element is ignored. 請參閱[XslTransform 的輸出](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for more information. 這個方法可讓您執行非同步轉換的來源文件。This method enables you to do an asynchronous transformation of the source document. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法已過時。This method is obsolete. 設定屬性會決定如何 XSLT document （） 函式已解決。The setting of the property determines how the XSLT document() function is resolved. 建議的做法是使用採用方法物件做為其中一個引數。The recommended practice is to use the method which takes an object as one of its arguments.

XSLT 樣式表必須包含命名空間宣告`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. > [!NOTE] > 此方法現在已過時。This method is now obsolete. 設定屬性會決定如何 XSLT`document()`函式已解決。The setting of the property determines how the XSLT `document()` function is resolved. 建議的做法是使用採用方法物件做為其中一個引數。The recommended practice is to use the method which takes an object as one of its arguments. `args`與進行比對`xsl:param`樣式表中定義的項目。The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 上的編碼方式屬性`xsl:output`項目時，無法輸出至。The encoding attribute on an `xsl:output` element is not supported when outputting to a . 請參閱[XslTransform 的輸出](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)如需詳細資訊，在其上`xsl:output`支援的屬性。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for specifics on which `xsl:output` attributes are supported. 轉換是指套用到整個文件。Transformations apply to the document as a whole. 換言之，如果您要傳入的節點不是文件的根節點，則不會阻止轉換程序取得已載入文件中的所有節點。In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 若要轉換節點片段，您必須建立包含僅節點片段，並將其傳遞到方法。To transform a node fragment, you must create an containing just the node fragment, and pass that to the method. 下列範例會執行的轉換節點片段。The following example performs a transformation on a node fragment. ```csharp XslTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); xslt.Load("print_root.xsl"); XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.Load("library.xml"); // Create a new document containing just the node fragment. XmlNode testNode = doc.DocumentElement.FirstChild; XmlDocument tmpDoc = new XmlDocument(); tmpDoc.LoadXml(testNode.OuterXml); // Pass the document containing the node fragment // to the Transform method. Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out); ``` 此範例會使用`library.xml`和`print_root.xsl`檔案做為輸入，並將下列命令以在主控台的輸出。The example uses the `library.xml` and `print_root.xsl` files as input and outputs the following to the console. ``` Passing Pride And Prejudice to print_root.xsl Root node is book. ``` `library.xml` ```xml Pride And Prejudice Hook ``` `print_root.xsl` ```xml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 類別是新的 XSLT 處理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 XslCompiledTransform 類別](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)並[從 XslTransform 類別移轉](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支援 XSLT 1.0 語法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 樣式表必須包含命名空間宣告`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. `args`與進行比對`xsl:param`樣式表中定義的項目。The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. `xsl:output`至輸出時，不支援項目(`xsl:output`項目會被忽略)。The `xsl:output` element is not supported when outputting to an (the `xsl:output` element is ignored). 請參閱[XslTransform 的輸出](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for more information. 這個方法可讓您執行非同步轉換的來源文件。This method enables you to do an asynchronous transformation of the source document. 轉換是指套用到整個文件。Transformations apply to the document as a whole. 換言之，如果您要傳入的節點不是文件的根節點，則不會阻止轉換程序取得已載入文件中的所有節點。In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 若要轉換節點片段，您必須建立包含僅節點片段，並將其傳遞到方法。To transform a node fragment, you must create an containing just the node fragment, and pass that to the method. 下列範例會執行的轉換節點片段。The following example performs a transformation on a node fragment. ```csharp XslTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); xslt.Load("print_root.xsl"); XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.Load("library.xml"); // Create a new document containing just the node fragment. XmlNode testNode = doc.DocumentElement.FirstChild; XmlDocument tmpDoc = new XmlDocument(); tmpDoc.LoadXml(testNode.OuterXml); // Pass the document containing the node fragment // to the Transform method. Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out, null); ``` 此範例會使用`library.xml`和`print_root.xsl`檔案做為輸入，並將下列命令以在主控台的輸出。The example uses the `library.xml` and `print_root.xsl` files as input and outputs the following to the console. ``` Passing Pride And Prejudice to print_root.xsl Root node is book. ``` `library.xml` ```xml Pride And Prejudice Hook ``` `print_root.xsl` ```xml ``` ## Examples 下列範例會將轉換 XML 文件，並將結果輸出至`XmlReader`。The following example transforms an XML document and outputs the results to an `XmlReader`. 具有必要認證用來處理所有 XSLT`document()`函式。An with the necessary credentials is used to process any XSLT `document()` functions. [!code-cpp[XslTransform.Transform4#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Transform4/CPP/trans_snip3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XslTransform.Transform4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Transform4/CS/trans_snip3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XslTransform.Transform4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Transform4/VB/trans_snip3.vb#1)]

XSLT 樣式表必須包含命名空間宣告`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. `args`與進行比對`xsl:param`樣式表中定義的項目。The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 整體套用至文件的轉換選取項目。The transformation selections apply to the document as a whole. 換句話說，如果目前節點設定在文件根節點以外的節點樹狀結構，轉換程序不會防止存取載入的文件中的所有節點。In other words, if the current node is set on a node tree other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 在執行轉換後，會保留在其原始狀態。After the transformation has been performed, the remains in its original state. 這表示節點，也就是目前轉換程序之前，會保留目前的節點之後已呼叫方法。This means that the node, which is current before the transformation process, remains the current node after the method has been called. 請參閱[XslTransform 的輸出](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)如需詳細資訊，在其上`xsl:output`支援的屬性。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for specifics on which `xsl:output` attributes are supported. > [!NOTE] > 此方法現在已過時。This method is now obsolete. 設定屬性會決定如何 XSLT`document()`函式已解決。The setting of the property determines how the XSLT `document()` function is resolved. 建議的做法是使用採用方法物件做為其中一個引數。The recommended practice is to use the method which takes an object as one of its arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 類別是新的 XSLT 處理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 XslCompiledTransform 類別](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)並[從 XslTransform 類別移轉](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支援 XSLT 1.0 語法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 樣式表必須包含命名空間宣告`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. `args`與進行比對`xsl:param`樣式表中定義的項目。The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 整體套用至文件的轉換選取項目。The transformation selections apply to the document as a whole. 換句話說，如果目前節點設定在文件根節點以外的節點樹狀結構，轉換程序不會防止存取載入的文件中的所有節點。In other words, if the current node is set on a node tree other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 在執行轉換後，會保留在其原始狀態。After the transformation is performed, the remains in its original state. 這表示節點，也就是目前轉換程序之前，會保留目前的節點之後已呼叫方法。This means that the node, which is current before the transformation process, remains the current node after the method has been called. 上的編碼方式屬性`xsl:output`項目時，無法輸出至。The encoding attribute on an `xsl:output` element is not supported when outputting to a . 請參閱[XslTransform 的輸出](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)如需詳細資訊，在其上`xsl:output`支援的屬性。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for specifics on which `xsl:output` attributes are supported. > [!NOTE] > 此方法現在已過時。This method is now obsolete. 設定屬性會決定如何 XSLT`document()`函式已解決。The setting of the property determines how the XSLT `document()` function is resolved. 建議的做法是使用採用方法物件做為其中一個引數。The recommended practice is to use the method which takes an object as one of its arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 類別是新的 XSLT 處理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 XslCompiledTransform 類別](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)並[從 XslTransform 類別移轉](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支援 XSLT 1.0 語法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 樣式表必須包含命名空間宣告`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. `args`與進行比對`xsl:param`樣式表中定義的項目。The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 整體套用至文件的轉換選取項目。The transformation selections apply to the document as a whole. 換句話說，如果目前節點設定在文件根節點以外的節點樹狀結構，轉換程序不會防止存取載入的文件中的所有節點。In other words, if the current node is set on a node tree other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 在執行轉換後，會保留在其原始狀態。After the transformation has been performed, the remains in its original state. 這表示節點，也就是目前轉換程序之前，會保留目前的節點之後已呼叫方法。This means that the node, which is current before the transformation process, remains the current node after the method has been called. 因為提供唯讀的輸出，`xsl:output`項目會被忽略。Because provides read-only output, the `xsl:output` element is ignored. 請參閱[XslTransform 的輸出](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for more information. 這個方法可讓您執行非同步轉換的來源文件。This method enables you to do an asynchronous transformation of the source document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 類別是新的 XSLT 處理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 XslCompiledTransform 類別](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)並[從 XslTransform 類別移轉](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支援 XSLT 1.0 語法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 樣式表必須包含命名空間宣告`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. `args`與進行比對`xsl:param`樣式表中定義的項目。The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 轉換是指套用到整個文件。Transformations apply to the document as a whole. 換言之，如果您要傳入的節點不是文件的根節點，則不會阻止轉換程序取得已載入文件中的所有節點。In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 若要轉換節點片段，您必須建立包含僅節點片段，並將其傳遞到方法。To transform a node fragment, you must create an containing just the node fragment and pass that to the method. 下列範例會執行的轉換節點片段。The following example performs a transformation on a node fragment. ```csharp XslTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); xslt.Load("print_root.xsl"); XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.Load("library.xml"); // Create a new document containing just the node fragment. XmlNode testNode = doc.DocumentElement.FirstChild; XmlDocument tmpDoc = new XmlDocument(); tmpDoc.LoadXml(testNode.OuterXml); // Pass the document containing the node fragment // to the Transform method. Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out, null); ``` 此範例會使用`library.xml`和`print_root.xsl`檔案做為輸入，並將下列命令以在主控台的輸出。The example uses the `library.xml` and `print_root.xsl` files as input and outputs the following to the console. ``` Passing Pride And Prejudice to print_root.xsl Root node is book. ``` `library.xml` ```xml Pride And Prejudice Hook ``` `print_root.xsl` ```xml ``` ## Examples 下列範例會執行 ASP.NET 頁面內的轉換。The following example performs a transformation within an ASP.NET page. [!code-aspx-csharp[XslTransform.Transform5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Transform5/CS/transcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[XslTransform.Transform5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Transform5/VB/transvb.aspx#1)]

XmlNode testNode = doc.DocumentElement.FirstChild; XmlDocument tmpDoc = new XmlDocument(); tmpDoc.LoadXml(testNode.OuterXml); // Pass the document containing the node fragment // to the Transform method. Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out, null); ``` 此範例會使用`library.xml`和`print_root.xsl`檔案做為輸入，並將下列命令以在主控台的輸出。The example uses the `library.xml` and `print_root.xsl` files as input and outputs the following to the console. ``` Passing Pride And Prejudice to print_root.xsl Root node is book. ``` `library.xml` ```xml Pride And Prejudice Hook ``` `print_root.xsl` ```xml ``` ## Examples 下列範例會轉換為 XML 檔案，並將輸出 HTML 字串。The following example transforms an XML file and outputs an HTML string. 和類別用來讀取和寫入字串。The and classes are used to read and write the strings. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 類別是新的 XSLT 處理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 XslCompiledTransform 類別](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)並[從 XslTransform 類別移轉](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支援 XSLT 1.0 語法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 樣式表必須包含命名空間宣告`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. `args`與進行比對`xsl:param`樣式表中定義的項目。The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. `xsl:output`至輸出時，不支援項目(`xsl:output`會被忽略)。The `xsl:output` element is not supported when outputting to an (`xsl:output` is ignored). 請參閱[XslTransform 的輸出](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for more information. 轉換是指套用到整個文件。Transformations apply to the document as a whole. 換言之，如果您要傳入的節點不是文件的根節點，則不會阻止轉換程序取得已載入文件中的所有節點。In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 若要轉換節點片段，您必須建立包含僅節點片段，並將其傳遞到方法。To transform a node fragment, you must create an containing just the node fragment and pass that to the method. 下列範例會執行的轉換節點片段。The following example performs a transformation on a node fragment. ```csharp XslTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); xslt.Load("print_root.xsl"); XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.Load("library.xml"); // Create a new document containing just the node fragment. XmlNode testNode = doc.DocumentElement.FirstChild; XmlDocument tmpDoc = new XmlDocument(); tmpDoc.LoadXml(testNode.OuterXml); // Pass the document containing the node fragment // to the Transform method. Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out, null); ``` 此範例會使用`library.xml`和`print_root.xsl`檔案做為輸入，並將下列命令以在主控台的輸出。The example uses the `library.xml` and `print_root.xsl` files as input and outputs the following to the console. ``` Passing Pride And Prejudice to print_root.xsl Root node is book. ``` `library.xml` ```xml Pride And Prejudice Hook ``` `print_root.xsl` ```xml ``` ## Examples 下列範例會將 XML 文件轉換成 HTML 文件。The following example transforms an XML document into an HTML document. 它會在資料表中顯示 ISBN、 標題和每本書籍的價格。It displays the ISBN, title, and price for each book in a table. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 範例會使用下列兩個輸入檔案。The sample uses the following two input files. `books.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/XML/books.xml#2)] `output.xsl` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/XML/output.xsl#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 類別是新的 XSLT 處理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 XslCompiledTransform 類別](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)並[從 XslTransform 類別移轉](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支援 XSLT 1.0 語法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 樣式表必須包含命名空間宣告`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. `args`與進行比對`xsl:param`樣式表中定義的項目。The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 整體套用至文件的轉換選取項目。The transformation selections apply to the document as a whole. 換句話說，如果目前節點設定在文件根節點以外的節點樹狀結構，轉換程序不會防止存取載入的文件中的所有節點。In other words, if the current node is set on a node tree other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 在執行轉換後，會保留在其原始狀態。After the transformation has been performed, the remains in its original state. 這表示節點，也就是目前轉換程序之前，會保留目前的節點之後已呼叫方法。This means that the node, which is current before the transformation process, remains the current node after the method has been called. 請參閱[XslTransform 的輸出](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)如需詳細資訊，在其上`xsl:output`支援的屬性。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for specifics on which `xsl:output` attributes are supported. ## Examples 下列範例會載入至 customer 資料表和執行 XSLT 轉換成 HTML 表提取客戶資料。The following example loads a customer table into an and performs an XSLT transformation to pull the customer data into an HTML table. 此範例會使用 Microsoft SQL Server 2000 的 Northwind 資料庫。The example uses the Microsoft SQL Server 2000 Northwind database. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 類別是新的 XSLT 處理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 XslCompiledTransform 類別](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)並[從 XslTransform 類別移轉](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支援 XSLT 1.0 語法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 樣式表必須包含命名空間宣告`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. `args`與進行比對`xsl:param`樣式表中定義的項目。The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 整體套用至文件的轉換選取項目。The transformation selections apply to the document as a whole. 換句話說，如果目前節點設定在文件根節點以外的節點樹狀結構，轉換程序不會防止存取載入的文件中的所有節點。In other words, if the current node is set on a node tree other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 在執行轉換後，會保留在其原始狀態。After the transformation is performed, the remains in its original state. 這表示節點，也就是目前轉換程序之前，會保留目前的節點之後已呼叫方法。This means that the node, that is current before the transformation process, remains the current node after the method has been called. `xsl:output`至輸出時，不支援項目(`xsl:output`會被忽略)。The `xsl:output` element is not supported when outputting to an (`xsl:output` is ignored). 請參閱[XslTransform 的輸出](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for more information. ## Examples 下列範例會載入並編輯 XML 文件執行 XSLT 轉換之前。The following example loads and edits an XML document before performing an XSLT transform. [!code-cpp[XslTransform.Transform2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Transform2/CPP/trans_snip.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XslTransform.Transform2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Transform2/CS/trans_snip.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XslTransform.Transform2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Transform2/VB/trans_snip.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 類別是新的 XSLT 處理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 XslCompiledTransform 類別](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)並[從 XslTransform 類別移轉](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 在 1.1 版的.NET framework，應用程式的信任層級會決定預設的行為：In version 1.1 of the .NET Framework, the trust level of the application determines the default behavior: `Fully trusted code:` 預設值不需要使用者的認證用來解析`document()`函式。`Fully trusted code:` A default with no user credentials is used to resolve the `document()` function. 如果驗證才能存取外部資源，使用這個屬性來指定具有必要認證。If authentication is required to access the external resource, use this property to specify an with the necessary credentials. `Semi-trusted code:` 屬性設定為`null`，這表示`document()`函式不會解析。`Semi-trusted code:` The property is set to `null`, which means the `document()` function is not resolved. 由於完全信任，才能指定，這個屬性也無法設定。Because full trust is required to specify an , this property also cannot be set. 使用這個解析程式時 XSLT`document()`函式會叫用。This resolver is used when the XSLT `document()` function is invoked. 它將不會用來解決`xsl:import`和`xsl:include`樣式表中所參考的項目。It is not used to resolve `xsl:import` and `xsl:include` elements referenced in the style sheet. 指定要用來解析`xsl:import`並`xsl:include`樣式表中所參考的項目會使用多載，這個方法會接受為其中一個引數。To specify an to use to resolve `xsl:import` and `xsl:include` elements referenced in the style sheet, use the overload, which takes an as one of its arguments. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是在.NET Framework 1.1 版中已過時。This property is obsolete in version 1.1 of the .NET Framework. 指定使用方法是建議的做法。Specifying an using the method is the recommended practice. 在此情況下，不會快取之後方法完成。In this case, the is not cached after the method completes.
